thread.title: London Restaurant Festival, gourmet treats for food connoisseursTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: London Restaurant Festival, gourmet treats for food connoisseursTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: London Restaurant Festival, gourmet treats for food connoisseursTravelandtourworld.com
text:
London Restaurant Festival, gourmet treats for food connoisseurs Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
If you love food, donâ€™t miss the London Restaurant Festival, three weeks of fabulous foodie events and special menus at London restaurants.
Now in its seventh year, the London Restaurant Festival is a city-wide celebration of London restaurants and chefs. From great-value festival restaurant-hopping menus to amazing one-off chef-led events, there is a great range of menus and activities on offer.
Features of the festival include some of the best restaurants in London which will create special fixed-priced taster menus as a way for food lovers to sample their dishes.
There will be a range of tours gathered by culinary theme.
Also, look out for other food-focused activities running throughout the festival from October 1.
Source: visitlondon.com
